code: @Test public void areAllMethodsMapped() throws Exception {     final Class<?>[] interfaces = Facebook.class.getInterfaces().     for (Class<?> clazz : interfaces) {         if (clazz.getName().endsWith("Methods")) {             // check all methods of this *Methods interface             for (Method method : clazz.getDeclaredMethods()) {                 final FacebookMethodsType methodsType = FacebookMethodsType.findMethod(method.getName(), method.getParameterTypes()).                 assertNotNull("Expected method mapping not found:" + method.getName(), methodsType).                 assertEquals("Methods are not equal", method, methodsType.getMethod()).             }         }     } }
